name: Girlfriends 4Ever
summary: DLC2 Content for The Girlfriends 4 Ever story proceeds where the original Girlfriends 4 Ever left off. Sayako faces one of the difficult choices in life, whether to blow her own rod or leave Tara with the honors. Spoiler alert: In this DLC Sayako rejects Tara's suggestion to blow herself, but not all is lost when Tara resolves to take matter into her own hands and face hole mostly!
info:
• 上映年度: 2013年07月21日
  • 片长: 27分
  • 制作: Affect3D
